Manila Councilor pens letter to cops for arrest of own children tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739281 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/739281/manila-councilor-pens-letter-to-cops-for-arrest-of-own-children/story/ An official in the City of Manila penned a letter allowing members of the Philippine National Police (PNP) and his colleagues to arrest his children for their alleged involvement in the illegal drug trade, Luisito Santos reported on Super Radyo's DZBB early Friday morning. Fri, 22 May 2020 04:17:18 +0800
5 women arrested in Dipolog buy-bust operation tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739280 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739280/5-women-arrested-in-dipolog-buy-bust-operation/story/ Five women were arrested in a drug buy-bust operation conducted by the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency (PDEA)- Zamboanga del Norte and the City Drugs Enforcement Unit of the Philippine National Police (PNP) in Dipolog in Sitio Anahawa, Barangay Galas, Dipolog City, Zamboanga Del Norte early Thursday morning. Fri, 22 May 2020 02:08:10 +0800

Fri, 22 May 2020 01:49:45 +0800
China's top political meetings open with minute silence over virus, threat to US tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739278 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739278/china-s-top-political-meetings-open-with-minute-silence-over-virus-threat-to-us/story/ China's annual high-level political meetings opened Thursday with a minute's silence for the victims of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic and a threat to hit back at the US in an escalating blame game over the disease. Fri, 22 May 2020 01:23:27 +0800

Fri, 22 May 2020 00:53:40 +0800
6, patay sa pamamaril ng nag-amok na dating sundalo; suspek, patay din tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739276 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739276/6-patay-sa-pamamaril-ng-nag-amok-na-dating-sundalo-suspek-patay-din/story/ Anim katao ang nasawi matapos magwala at mamaril ang isang dating sundalo sa Calbayog City, Samar. Ang suspek, patay din nang makipagbarilan sa mga rumesponding mga pulis. Fri, 22 May 2020 00:32:34 +0800
Cyclone kills at least 82 in India and Bangladesh, flooding lowlands tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739275 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739275/cyclone-kills-at-least-82-in-india-and-bangladesh-flooding-lowlands/story/ The most powerful cyclone to strike eastern India and Bangladesh in over a decade killed at least 82 people, officials said, as rescue teams scoured devastated coastal villages on Thursday, hampered by torn down power lines and widespread flooding. Fri, 22 May 2020 00:32:15 +0800
TESDA mulls opening of classes in June tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739273 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739273/tesda-mulls-opening-of-classes-in-june/story/ The Technical Education and Skills Development Authority (TESDA) on Thursday said it is looking to resume its classes by June. Fri, 22 May 2020 00:08:30 +0800
SWS: 4.2 million families experienced involuntary hunger amid COVID-19 crisis tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739274 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739274/sws-4-2-million-families-experienced-involuntary-hunger-amid-covid-19-crisis/story/ The number of Filipino families that experienced hunger due to a lack of food doubled in the past three months to around 4.2 million amid the coronavirus pandemic, a survey by the Social Weather Stations (SWS) found in a study released Thursday. Fri, 22 May 2020 00:08:30 +0800
Magpipinsan sa Batangas, ginawang swimming pool ang isang kwarto ng bahay tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739272 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739272/magpipinsan-sa-batangas-ginawang-swimming-pool-ang-isang-kwarto-ng-bahay/story/ Para mapawi ang init ng panahon, naisipan ng magpipinsan sa Batangas na gumawa ng kanilang swimming pool. Pero hindi lang basta swimming pool ang kanilang ginawa dahil nasa loob ito mismo ng bahay. Thu, 21 May 2020 23:52:45 +0800
'Pope Francis' begs in Milan street, his cassock in tatters tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739270 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739270/pope-francis-begs-in-milan-street-his-cassock-in-tatters/story/ On a street in Milan, the capital of Italy's Lombardy region, which has been hit particularly hard by the coronavirus pandemic, Pope Francis begs for alms, his cassock in tatters. US says pulling out of Open Skies treaty, citing Russian violations tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739269 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/739269/us-says-pulling-out-of-open-skies-treaty-citing-russian-violations/story/ The United States announced its intention to withdraw from the 35-nation Open Skies treaty that permits unarmed aerial surveillance flights over participating countries, saying Russia has repeatedly violated the terms of the pact. Thu, 21 May 2020 23:33:25 +0800
Pambihirang paniking puti, nakita sa Samal; unang inakalang sisiw na dinagit ng uwak tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739266 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739266/pambihirang-paniking-puti-nakita-sa-samal-unang-inakalang-sisiw-na-dinagit-ng-uwak/story/ Sa pag-aakalang sisiw ng alagang manok ang dinagit ng isang uwak, binato at nasagip ng isang residente sa Samal, Davao del Norte ang isang pambihirang paniki na puti ang kulay. Thu, 21 May 2020 23:22:47 +0800
Ex-soldier kills 6 in shooting spree in Calbayog, Samar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739268 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739268/ex-soldier-kills-6-in-shooting-spree-in-calbayog-samar/story/ Six victims were killed in Samar after a former soldier ran amok and went on a shooting spree in Calbayog City, according to Marisol Abdurahman's report on "24 Oras." The suspect himself ended up dead after fighting it out with responding police officers. Thu, 21 May 2020 23:16:05 +0800
Rodriguez, Rizal residents line up for assistance but social welfare officials stay home tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739265 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739265/rodriguez-rizal-residents-line-up-for-assistance-but-social-welfare-officials-stay-home/story/ Officials from Rodriguez's municipal social welfare department (MSWD) were no longer present in the area since they were at home and practicing self-quarantine, according to Maki Pulido's report on "24 Oras" Thursday. Thu, 21 May 2020 23:15:46 +0800
